outline:
1. to restrict, restrain, withhold, shut up, keep back, refrain, forbid
    1. (Qal)
      1. to shut up
      2. to restrain
      3. to withhold
    2. (Niphal) to be restrained
    3. (Piel) to finish
kjv_def: finish, forbid, keep (back), refrain, restrain, retain, shut up, be stayed, withhold.
strongs_def: to restrict, by act (hold back or in) or word (prohibit)
